website_summaries.verdict: The Wave Supersonic is styled after Mizuno running shoes. You can expect the same impact-absorption features but with enhanced lateral stability to support dynamic movements. Also, your feet are kept comfortable by its lightweight and breathable construction. In hindsight, these features make it appealing to consumers.
pros: A majority of the reviewers commend the underfoot cushioning on the Wave Supersonic as it is comfortable to use for games, walking, and even working out
Many volleyball players feel stable wearing this trainer because of the ankle support if offers
The fit is snug yet roomy at the forefoot, states a lot of owners
Multiple consumers claim that they have gotten great value from the purchase of this Mizuno volleyball shoe
More than a few wearers are satisfied with the arch support on this footgear
The lightness of the footwear has delighted several folks
Some people laud the grip of the outsole on wooden courts
cons: The durability of the Wave Supersonic has dismayed some users because the mesh and the eyelets have ripped after a few weeks of use
The trainer is initially stiff and needs to be broken in to prevent foot pains, a commenter has mentioned

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size up for these
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very small. I wear a 7, I ordered 7.5 and it is too tight and extremely uncomfortable. I think I need to just write this brand of shoe off my list! They never used to run so small - not sure what has changed but they do not run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good volleyball shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter for 7th grade volleyball. They held up really well and should be good for next season as well as long as her feet don't grow. She had no problems with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Fit and look great, my daughter is on her 4th month wearing them, indoors only 6 days a week and they still look new. They have held up very well and she said they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had Mizuno in the past and very happy I found a replacement. They fit perfectly, and are of excellent quality! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit true to size. Very snug fit to ensure for stability. Holds up well on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good volleyball shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my daughters volleyball shoes. They are working very well for her. Very comfortable and they do not slide on the court .
customer_reviews.author: Shea griffith

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: True to size, comfort. My daughter wears them with ankle braces and they fit well
customer_reviews.author: Erika Jennings

customer_reviews.title: One is extremely smaller than the other.
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. The shoes say the same size but they clearly are NOT! The right one fits more like a 5 and the left like the 7 it’s suppose to be. Completely different sizes. Unfortuufor me I missed the return date because my kids misplaced the box. Go to the store try them on, do not order from here.
customer_reviews.author: Randi hill

customer_reviews.title: good volleyball shoe
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this shoe before, but needed to get a half size up for foot growth. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Cal Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They fit my daughter perfectly and she wears them for all of her volleyball practices and tournaments. Cute, comfortable and no sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: She is excited for volleyball season so she can wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: They ran a half size small. But with the new, larger pair, they fit perfectly! Now my daughter can really enjoy her first year on the volleyball court!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non skid soles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays volleyball. The shoe seems to do well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have great support & don't slide on the court. They were a little tighter than I normally would want but ordering a wide would've been too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The Grip is the Best Feature
customer_reviews.text: I use these for racquetball. Pretty good fit. Might not work for people with wide feet. Great grip for indoor courts. I was sliding all over the place in my other shoes. No more sliding with these.
customer_reviews.author: SistahNextDoor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter perfectly so I would say true to size
customer_reviews.author: Khala West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came quickly, fit was perfect and the shoes are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grip, fit and comfotables
customer_reviews.text: I use it for table tennis... really nice shoes, great fit (My size: Men 11 - Women 13), good grip and very very comfortables.
customer_reviews.author: Torreamarilla

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but need to go up a size or 2
customer_reviews.author: Matt Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and she LOVES them! Sizing was as advertised and the style was awesome! On the court she had no complaints and didn't slide around or anything. Highly recommend these if you're in the market for some new vball shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno WAVE SUPERSONIC WOMENS
product_meta.description:
* The Mizuno® Wave Supersonic volleyball shoes will take your game over the net and across the court.
 * Built-in cushioning and lateral support for use on the Volleyball court.
 * Cushioning minimizes the impact of each landing.
 * Breathable air mesh and synthetic upper materials. 
 * INTERCOOL ventilation system reduces heat and humidity build-up inside the shoe during performance.
 * Lace-up closure.
 * Lightly padded tongue and collar. 
 * Soft collar and interior lining helps reduce the likelihood of irritation. 
 * Removable foam insole.
 * U4ic midsole works together with the Wave plate for a softer underfoot feel and smoother transitions.
 * Redesigned Neutral Wave® plate provides softer cushioning, and enhanced response. 
 * Articulated U4icX heel wedge supplies greater cushioning for a softer feel. 
 * Non-marking rubber outsole provides long-lasting wear. 
 * Dynamotion groove engineering promotes a great transition from heel-to-toe with each stride.
 * Imported. 
 * Measurements: *  Weight: 9 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: AIRmesh Upper: Air Mesh Upper for superior feel, breathability, and comfort
SR Touch: Shock absorbing mid-sole. Advanced cushioning material that is lighter, absorbs shock, and keeps the transition smooth and fast
Engineered for the female volleyball player

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars1 rating5.0 out of 5 stars
